Name: Reflector
Description: Reflector allows a user to debug Java applications by accessing private fields at runtime.

Name: LifeSim
Description: LifeSim is a zero-player game with 2-d graphics based on Conway's Game of Life.

Name: Forcer
Description: Forcer brute forces passwords, given a list of their md5sums.

Name: WHBot
Description: WarehouseBot provides the optimal solution to one of the 2019 ASP challenge problems.

Name: SIR
Description: SIR uses labeled training samples of images of human handwriting to classify images of test data.

Name: UIR
Description: UIR clusters unlabeled training samples of human handwriting to cluster images of test data.

Name: Xchange
Description: EthereumXchange allows users to send the Ethereum cryptocurrency between wallets.

Name: NeuroSim
Description: NeuroSim is a spiking neuron simulator that approximates solutions to Hindmarshâ€“Rose equations using Euler's method.

Name: OntologizeThis
Description: OntologizeThis is an answer set solver for propositional logic formulae.

Name: MessageMe
Description: MessageMe is an online, full-stack chat application.

Name: PI
Description: PI is an interpreter for a Pascal-like language.

Name: TS
Description: TS is a multithreaded simulation of traffic intersections.
